question: The Finance Ministry has allowed 5 states to borrow Rs 9,913 crore based on their implementation of which scheme?
explanation:
The Finance ministry has recently permitted five states to borrow an additional Rs 9,913 crore on aggregate through open market borrowings (OMBs).
This permission has been permitted based on their implementation of reforms relating to the One Nation One Ration Card system. The 5 states were Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, Karnataka, Goa and Tripura.
